channel.title: transition on Digital space of K. Bret Staudt Willet
channel.description: Recent content in transition on Digital space of K. Bret Staudt Willet

item.title: Transition Supports Through Social Media
item.description: Introduction New teachers face numerous decisions as they transition from teacher preparation into enacting practice (i.e., their induction period). They must reconcile conflicting messages about what and how to teach from the academic world of the preparation program and the practical world of their school of employment. Interviews with new teachers provide evidence of why new teachers seek supports for professional leaning to complement formal induction programs offered by schools and districts.
